Message: Hi babe, did you get home ok last night?
Yes. Thanks for waiting for me until my mum showed up.
It's fine :) What are you up to this weekend?
I have to look after my little brother as my mum is at work. How about you?
Not much really, will probably see some mates later. Hey, maybe we could meet up sometime?
That would be fab.
Ok, I'll message you soon. It was great to meet you last night :)
Hey Sarah, did you get home safe? It was cool seeing you at the party last night ;)
Yeah
column6: I got home fine. Thanks for checking in :)

Message: Morning sleepy babe. How are you today?
I'm good, how are you?
I'm good. I've been thinking about you. Do you want to meet up on Wednesday?
Love to :) What time?
What time do you finish school?
Meet you in the rec at 4pm then?
Gr8.
See you then. I can't wait.
How about you
column6: Sarah? Free next week? Maybe we could hang out after school? ;)

Message: Yeah
column6: sounds fun. When were you thinking?

Message: How about Tuesday?
Works for me :)
Hi Lottie, need some company tonight? ;)
Are you offering?!
Can I come round?
I would like you to, but I don’t think mum would be happy as I'm babysitting. How are you?
Pretty good thanks, how about you?
I'm good, just a bit bored.
I'm really looking forward to seeing you on Weds.
Me too :)
Are you going to be wearing what you wore at the disco?!
LOL no, I'll be in my school uniform unfortunately. :/
Even better! ;)
Hey Sarah, what are you wearing right now? ;)
Haha
Just curious. You looked good in your outfit last night.
I had such a good time this afternoon. I wish we could have spent longer together.
Me too. Sorry I had to leave, but mum doesn't like me staying out late.
I totally understand, I just wish I could be with you ALL the time.
That's sweet.
Well
column6: I think you're really sweet. When can we meet up again?

Message: I'm not sure. Maybe the weekend?
So
column6: any chance we can meet sooner? ;)

Message: Maybe Friday? What do you want to do?
I'll think of something fun... ;) How about something private?
We’ll see...
Hi Lottie, how are you? I can't stop thinking about (all) of you. I think you're amazing.
I'm really good. I keep thinking about you too.
What sort of things are you thinking? I keep thinking about how pretty you are.
I'm blushing! Do you really think that?
Of course. You're beautiful. I love your hair. Gorg!
No one has ever said that to me before. Apart from my mum! lol
Well
I was thinking about you today. I really want to see more of you, if you know what I mean... ;)
Haha
Just a little something to keep me going until we meet up again?
We'll see what I can do... ;)
What did you mean then?
I meant that I wish I could see more of your body, if you know what I mean... ;)
Oh I see! blushes
I was thinking about what you said the other day... Maybe I could send you something soon.
That would be amazing, Sarah. I'd love to see you. I think you're so special. Just between us. ;)
